name: Fishy Friends!
description:
Make some colourful friends in a relaxing 8-bit environment!

With over one hundred million possible combinations, no fish in this game is the same!

Z key - O button
X key - X button
Arrowkeys - Move
CTRL+6 - Screenshot your fishy friends!

Credits
Music by Robby Duguay, check his work out here
Art, SFX & Writing by Showie Gau
Art, Code & Writing by Thomas van Eekelen

Feel free to suggest your own name, adjective or blurb here in the comments or on any of our social media!
https://linktr.ee/fishyfriendsgame
